title: [Kodak Cinegraph compilation. No. 07]
brief_description: A compilation of early silent footage featuring Australian and North American wildlife. Shows kangaroos, wallabies, bandicoots, opossum (including an albino opossum), wombat, koala, Tasmanian devil, platypus and echidna. Also shows footage at a real rodeo in Pendleton, Oregon and a fight betweena cobra and a mongoose.
